title: A look at how a local police department handled misconduct allegations against one of its own
dc:creator: WBUR
description: It took more than a year and a half to bring charges against a Natick Police officer who is accused of indecent assault on a police dispatcher. Along the way, complaints of police dragging their feet on the investigation, and refusing to turn over records from within the department.
